name: Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics
author: wp-buy

sections.description:
Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics is a Counter and statistics plugin for WordPress to display your WordPress blog statistics and traffic. Ranging from general total statistics
This plugin will help you to track your visitors, browsers, operating systems, visits and much more..
When it comes to ease of use, Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics comes in first, You will have a real Counter and statistics plugin for your WordPress website..
This plugin will help you to track your visitors, browsers, operating systems, visits and much more in one dashboard page..

And you can use one the summary statistics shortcodes:

You can use one of the following shortcodes:

  • [ahc_stats_widget] adds a front-end widget to display the site statistics

  • [ahc_stats_widget title=”” fontsize=”16″ fonttype=”” display_today_visitors=true display_today_pageviwes=true display_total_visitors=true display_total_pageviwes=true ] adds a front-end widget to display the site statistics with custom parametrs

  • [ahc_today_visitors] this will return today’s visitors

  • [ahc_today_visits] this will return today’s visits
  • [ahc_total_visitors] this will return total visitors
  • [ahc_total_visits] this will return total visits

Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics Basic version includes:

  • Comprehensive overview page (Dashboard), including browser versions, country stats, hits, exclusions, referrers, searches, search words and visitors
  • Visits & Visitors, see how many hits your site get in the last two weeks
  • see how many people are viewing your site by weekly statistics
  • Search Engines, see search queries and redirects from popular search engines like Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Yahoo, Yandex and Baidu
  • Browsers statistics will help you to see the most popular browser
  • Recent visitors and the visitor source , also you can see the referrer link
  • Top referring sites & the visitors count for each one
  • Shortcode support

Visitor Traffic Real Time Statistics Pro includes:

✅ PRO version product page

  • Multisite (network) support
  • User online to show how many people are currently viewing your blog
  • Comprehensive overview page (Dashboard), including browser versions, country stats, hits, exclusions, referrers, searches, search words and visitors
  • Visits, see how many hits your site gets each day and each week & month
  • Visitors, see who’s visiting your site
  • see how many people are viewing your site by monthly statistics
  • Page tracking, see which pages are viewed most often
  • Search Engines, see search queries and redirects from popular search engines like Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Yahoo, Yandex and Baidu
  • visitors locations by Countries
  • Visits & Visitors Statistics will help you to see how many hits your site gets each day & see who’s visiting your site
  • Interactive Google map of visitors location
  • Referral search engines in the last month
  • Browsers statistics will help you to see the most popular browser
  • Recent visitors and the visitor source , also you can see the referrer link
  • Top referring sites & the visitors count for each one
  • Visits time graph to view the daily visitors per hour
  • GeoIP location by Country using maxmind database
  • The latest search key words, this will help you to know the most popular keyword
  • Traffic by title Statistics will help you to see the top ten posts and number of hits

Useful Links:

✅ Go PRO Now üôÇ
✅Support Center
sections.installation:
1. Download the package.
  2. Upload the package using your plugins page > add new > upload or Extract the contents of .zip folder to wp-content/plugins/ folder
  3. Activate the Plugin via plugins page

Thanks!
sections.faq:
How to setup this plugin?

  1. Download the package.
  2. Upload the package using your plugins page > add new > upload or Extract the contents of .zip folder to wp-content/plugins/ folder
  3. Activate the Plugin via plugins page

Or you can go to your website dashboard > plugins > add new and search for visitor traffic real time statistics then download and activate it.

Notes:
* After installing the plugin you need to go to plugin settings page and select your timezone.
* If you’re using any caching plugins, Don’t forget to clear your website cache.

How to setup the PRO version of this plugin?

  1. Purchase your licenses by visiting our website here
  2. Check your email (Inbox and Junk mail) to download the plugin zipped file
  3. Open your website dashboard > Plugins > Add new and upload the plugin file (zipped file)
  4. Activate the plugin
  5. Go to your website main menu > visitor Traffic Pro

Notes:
* After installing the plugin you need to go to plugin settings page and select your timezone.
* If you’re using any caching plugins, Don’t forget to clear your website cache.

Shortcodes for summary statistics

You can use one of the following shortcodes:

  • [ahc_stats_widget] adds a front-end widget to display the site statistics

  • [ahc_stats_widget title=”” fontsize=”16″ fonttype=”” display_today_visitors=true display_today_pageviwes=true display_total_visitors=true display_total_pageviwes=true ] adds a front-end widget to display the site statistics with custom parametrs

  • [ahc_today_visitors] this will return today’s visitors

  • [ahc_today_visits] this will return today’s visits
  • [ahc_total_visitors] this will return total visitors

  • [ahc_total_visits] this will return total visits

  • [ahc_yesterday_total_visitors] this will return the yesterday’s total visitors

  • [ahc_yesterday_total_visits] this will return the yesterday’s total visits

GDPR Compliant?

All the data is saved locally in your WordPress, it‚Äôs not necessary to create a data processing contract with an external company!

Does this plugin support Multisite?

This plugin doesn‚Äôt officially support the multisite feature; But it should function without any issue. We will fully support multisite in the next releases

How do I stop automatically unzipping downloaded zip files in Mac Safari?

If you are MAC user, you may face this problem problem

Your browser (Safari) is automatically unzipping downloaded zip files ? And this is not good because i want the plugin file to still compressed as is
To fix this please do the following steps:

  1. Open Safari
  2. Click Preferences
  3. Under the General tab, unCheck the option Open ‚Äúsafe‚Äù files after downloadin

Does this plugin work with caching plugins?

Yes, the cache support added in the latest 5 versions.

If you’re using any caching plugins, Don’t forget to clear your website cache.

PHP 7 Support?

yes, This plugin is working fine with PHP 7.x, If you have any issues.Please feel free to report it.

IPv6 Support?

This plugin supports IPv6; however, PHP must be compiled with IPv6 support enabled;
